cause.description:
As everyone knows....the Ottowa Senators were recently in the Stanley Cup Finals and lets say there overall play was rather gay. They are an unentertaining team who does not score highlight goals like there rivals. There best goals was a pass off of Phillips stick in game 5 that found its way behind Ray Emory to give the Ducks a clear victory. There gayest goal was a "Pele" worthy goal by the captian Daniel Alfredsson. "Pele" also pulled the biggest asshole move of the playoffs after he took a direct shot at Scott Neidermyer at the end of the second period.
1. Getting Canada a real hockey team
2. Lowering the Gayness of Ottowa by 10% in 5 years
3. Getting Alfredsson removed from the captiancy
cause.mission: is to decrease the gay-ness level of the overall play of the Ottowa Senators by 10% in 5 years
cause.name: Ottowa Senator's Need Your help to be less Gay
